emotes_server_game_data_error_message: Sorry! Something went wrong with your emote wheel. Please try again, or contact player support if the problem persists. Error code: EM01
emotes_server_general_error_message: Sorry! Something went wrong loading your emotes. Please try again, or contact player support if the problem persists. Error code: EM02
emotes_server_generic_error_message: Sorry! Something went wrong saving your emote loadout. Please try again, or contact player support if the problem persists. Error code: EM03
emotes_server_catalog_error_message: Sorry! We were unable to access your emotes catalog. Please try again, or contact player support if the problem persists. Error code: EM04
emotes_server_loadouts_error_message: Sorry! We were unable to access your emotes loadout. Please try again, or contact player support if the problem persists. Error code: EM05
emote_tutorial_sub_header: It’s time to stop dying while typing. Emotes let you react in real-time with a customizable loadout of in-game expressions. Here’s how to set them up:
emote_tutorial_loadout_panel_message: Equip emotes from your Collections tab or in Champ Select
emote_tutorial_game_wheel_message:
Use the emote wheel ingame
(bound to T by default)
emote_tutorial_collection_sheet_message: Expand your collection by purchasing emotes from the store’s Emotes tab
